BookDescription: What makes a hero? Is it destiny? The unwavering determination to stand up for all that is good? The audacity of doing the impossible? Or just the tales bards weave to captivate their audience?

Whatever you think the correct answer is, in this Player's Handbook you'll find everything you need to create your hero and join the fight Against the Darkmaster. We’ve collected all the player-facing rules in the Against the Darkmaster Core Rules and the spells in the Grimoire to give you a book that would be easier to carry around and reference during play.
In other words, you can think of this Player’s Handbook as your trusty backpack, containing just what you need to venture forth in a world of high adventure.
Featuring
Character creation rules
Adventuring and Traveling rules
Tactical combat and brutal Critical Strikes
Flexible magic system with over 300 spells

BookDescription: Get ready to join the fight with the new, revised Against the Darkmaster Core Rules! Within this 563 pages long, 8.5″x11″ hardcover tome of arcane knowledge, you’ll find everything both the GM and the players need to play, plus the three-parts campaign module Shadows of the Northern Woods.
A complete rule system, including:
Unified d100-based action resolution mechanic
Huge variety of character customization options
Detailed travel mechanics for long overland adventures
Flexible magic system with over 300 spells
Tactical combat and brutal Critical Strikes
Immersive rules for character driven adventures
A Bestiary with over 60 fearsome creatures
A full introductory campaign in three parts

BookName: Adventure Module - The Beast of Willow Lake
BookShortName: Adventure Module - The Beast of Willow Lake
BookPDF: D:\OneDrive\Master Vault\Against The Darkmaster\Adventure Module - The Beast of Willow Lake.pdf
BookDescription: People are disappearing in the sleepy town of Willow Lake. The terrified villagers speak of a terrible beast stalking the woods at night. But is the small town as peaceful as it seems? Do you have what it takes to solve the mystery of The Beast of Willow Lake?

BookPDF: D:\OneDrive\Master Vault\Against The Darkmaster\The Silence of Dawnfell.pdf
BookDescription: Silence has fallen over the town of Dawnfell. The enchanted ringing of Frostchime, the sacred bell that wards away the clan of wild trolls in the Biting Woods, has vanished. Now Dawnfell is open to vicious attacks - how long can it last?
The Silence of Dawnfell is an Adventure Module for 4-6 Level 1 characters, to be used with the Against the Darkmaster Core Rules.
Featuring:
A description of the town of Dawnfell and the Biting Woods, complete with keyed maps and several adventuring locations.
A cast of diverse and interesting NPCs, each with their own agenda and motivations.
Five different factions for the PCs to interact with, in their search for the enchanted bell.
An epic battle against a ferocious clan of Wild Trolls!
Unkeyed maps to be used with your favourite virtual tabletops.

BookAuthor: Massimiliano Caracristi, Tommaso Galmacci, Nikola Segoloni, Paolo Vecchiocattivi
BookPDF: D:\OneDrive\Master Vault\Against The Darkmaster\VSDQSDL - Against The Darkmaster - Quickstart.pdf
BookDescription: Return to the Classic Game of Fantasy Adventure!
Against the Darkmaster is an Epic Fantasy role-playing game of high adventures, eldritch magic and heavy metal combat.
Inspired by the classic fantasy sagas and 80s fantasy movies, Against the Darkmaster is built for heroic action and intense, character driven campaigns.
The Against the Darkmaster Deluxe Quickstart Rules include everything you need to start playing, In fact, it could well be a full RPG! This beautifully illustrated 122-page PDF includes:
Character creation rules and options;
Detailed rules for travels, combat and adventuring;
A complete magic system, with over 100 spells;
Attack tables and Critical Strikes;
Dozens of creatures for your heroes to face

BookDescription: This Game Master’s Guide contains everything an Against the Darkmaster GM needs to run and prepare their epic campaigns. We’ve collected all the GM-facing rules in the Against the Darkmaster Core Rules and the monsters in the Bestiary to give you a book that would be easier to carry around and reference during play.

Craft a living, breathing world for the players to explore. Weave the heroes’ deeds into a grandiose tale, inspired by your favorite fantasy sagas. Create your own Darkmaster, complete with world-shaking powers and legions of shadowy minions. Unleash the power of your imagination!
Featuring
Detailed guidelines on how to run and prepare your adventures
Rules for creating and handling opponents and other NPCs
Traveling and Hazards rules
Darkmaster creation rules
Optional rules for customizing your campaign
Magic Items and other rewards
A comprehensive Bestiary
